commits.message:
Revert "Make CheckBucket 90% cheaper"

Using HEAD requests to check bucket existence is cheaper, but causes us
to lose the contents of whatever error messages we would normally get,
hurting the quality of error messages for things like
euca-import-volume.  Since euca2ools do not generally check for bucket
existence as frequently as the typical boto-using program might, we
switch back to using GET to improve error output.

This reverts commit 4bd7c9c8afbc733d8ac2ecb4c6db3add895b3a6c.

Fixes TOOLS-491
